Package de.lases.control.backing

Class NewScientificForumBacking

java.lang.Object
de.lases.control.backing.NewScientificForumBacking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@ViewScoped @Named public class NewScientificForumBacking extends Object implements Serializable
Backing bean for the new scientific forum page.
See Also:
